Interface INotepad

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SecuredNotepad, SimpleNotepad
    public interface INotepad
    Create Interface for notepad - INotepad. Every notepad can do: - Calling method, which creates and writes on the newly created page - Rewrites some text on the chosen page - Deletes the text from the chosen page - Preview all the pages (prints the title and the text)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void createPage​(String title, String text)
      Method that creates new pages
      void deleteText​(int pageNumber)
      Method that deletes text in selected page
      void previewAllPages()
      Method that previews all the existing pages
      void replaceText​(int pageNumber, String text)
      Method that replaces text in selected page

    • Method Detail

      • createPage

        void createPage​(String title,
                String text)
        Method that creates new pages
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the new page
        text - the text on the new page

      • replaceText

        void replaceText​(int pageNumber,
                 String text)
          throws PageNotFoundException
        Method that replaces text in selected page
        Parameters:
        text - new text that should replace the old one
        pageNumber - the number of the page, that we want to edit
        Throws:
        PageNotFoundException

      • deleteText

        void deleteText​(int pageNumber)
         throws PageNotFoundException
        Method that deletes text in selected page
        Parameters:
        pageNumber - the number of the page, that we want to edit
        Throws:
        PageNotFoundException

      • previewAllPages

        void previewAllPages()
        Method that previews all the existing pages
